title: Sharing your documents
subtitle: Share online or download a PDF
description: Savviest allows you to download your resume or cover letter as a PDF or plain text, or share it online to really stand out and get access to application tracking.

steps.description: While the term 'resume' is used below, all steps apply to cover letters (in the corresponding section of the site).
To share your resume online and get access to application tracking:

steps: Click on 'Resumes' in the top bar or side menu.
Click 'Share Link' on the resume card that you want to share.
Copy the URL (you can click on the copy icon next to the URL), and share away!
You can disable a link by clicking on the resume card and clicking 'Disable Link' in the resume detail popup.

steps.description: To download a PDF version of your resume:

steps: Click on 'Resumes' in the top bar or side menu.
Click 'Download' on the resume card that you want to download. Your download will start automatically.
Alternatively, click 'Edit' on the resume card that you want to download.
Click 'Download Resume' in the editor toolbar.
Choose 'Download PDF' from the prompt at the bottom of the screen. Your download will start automatically.

steps.description: To download a plain text version of your resume:

steps: Click on 'Resumes' in the top bar or side menu.
Click 'Edit' on the resume card that you want to download.
Click 'Download Resume' in the editor toolbar.
Choose 'Download Plain Text' from the prompt at the bottom of the screen. Your download will start automatically.
